context: - Does this game have multiplayer mode?
Will this drive work  in  a black wii circa 2011?
response: I cannot say for sure whether it will our not, but I will tell you that the drive I got only worked for about a month before it went out.
It has lots, and I mean lots of games, but I do not see any solitaire games on the 101 Premium Games Collection. Sorry. Hope this helps.

context: Hi, i'd like to know if with this starter can i play with marvel characters.
response: Nope this is the 1.0 of the game you need to buy version 2.0 starter kit, however all the older characters will work with the 2.0 version.

context: My quadrant came with the suction cup part not attached to the mounting part which screws in to the back. Is this normal? How do I get it in?
response: I did not get a suction cup with mine that I can remember. I use the clap to attach it to my desk.

context: will this driver play dvd movies as well my wii didnt play dvd movies that i know of its the white wii with serial number lu105657406/  top na72mgef
response: The drive will act exactly as the previous one did no new capabilities that I know of.   This is to replace a burned out drive in a nintendo Wii.

context: Dose it work on MacBook Air?
response: Call the Apple store and ask them.  Its a great game btw.

context: Will this adapter provide the audio from Netflix or the TV app too? Or Just game audio
response: Any sound coming from Xbox will come through the adapter.  For example, we also listen to Amazon Prime shows and Youtube videos through it.  My teenage son is providing this explanation for you.  :)

context: are the keys themselves illuminated? does the actual letters light up or is it just backlight around the keys? just making sure
response: Looks to me that the keys are illuminated underneath. The keys don't appear to be actually lit individually. However the blue lighting make it harder so see the keys. They should have make it where you can change the lit colors.

context: Would this work on a New Zealand PS3?
response: Yes. I believe this is a region free game and should work in all ps3s.

context: because there are several prices of the same product of the I besiege amazon for this product? Is there some difference among them?
response: ...not that I know, I got the cheapest from a trusted seller and no problem so far. I've bought only one therefore I can't really compare. Mine work just fine.

MN#:  A-00060PN#:  881-000215I think these are correct or very close, it's almost impossible to see. This link tells how to find them, but the sticker is microscopic - http://logitech-en-amr.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/41626/section/troubleshoot/crid/411/lt_product_id/10786/tabs/1,3,2,4,5/cl/us,en

context: Key code doesn't work -- any ideas on how to resolve this problem?
response: If you bought a used copy, then you need to get a transfer of ownership from the original owner, and notify EA Games.  Otherwise you might have a pirated copy.  Also, before you do any of that, check your Cap Locks key, and retyping the key code.

context: Does this come as a single CD key for both, or one for each?
Does this device come with the chargeable backs to the Wii remotes, and how many Wii remotes does it carry?
Does this keyboard have mechanical keys?
response: It doesn't, but they almost feel like it.

context: if i buy the legendary edition do i need internet conection to activate it? if game needs autentification or updates im screwd
response: You will need an internet connection. You will need it to get the dlc unlocked through steam.
